TopicTitle: Does this remind anyone of Eeloo too?

Articles.Content:
While chatting else where. A user posted a link about Europa. Now does this not remind you of Eeloo just a little be. Sure does for myself.

The original article is here: http://www.redorbit.com/news/space/1113285701/remastered-view-of-jupiters-moon-europa-112314/ Just in case anyone wants to go there and read a little about it as well as watch a short video about it too.
http://photojournal.jpl.nasa.gov/jpeg/PIA19048.jpg Also the full sized image from NASA, so you don't have to go digging for it.
I do believe it is in fact analogous to Europa, "The physical characteristics of Eeloo are most likely an analogue of the ice moon Europa" http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Eeloo
I found this Picture of Europa earlier on the badastronomy-Blog and made it my Desktop Background
I read somewhere that there are plans in place to create another gas giant which has rings and eeloo will be moved to be one of its moons.
hmmm... so eeloo will bee like enceladus...

I read somewhere that there are plans in place to create another gas giant which has rings and eeloo will be moved to be one of its moons.

That's obsolete, unfortunately. They've mentioned that there are currently no plans to add more planets.

That's obsolete, unfortunately. They've mentioned that there are currently no plans to add more planets.

Not to derail this, but this is the first I have heard of this??!! are you sure??

Not to derail this, but this is the first I have heard of this??!! are you sure??

There WERE plans but SQUAD...

I heard that the idea of more planets wasn't abandoned, just put on the "definite maybe" list. It just depends on SQUAD's intentions. Personally, I think just one more gas giant would complete the solar system nicely.
Yeah, I've always assumed Eeloo is based on Europa for the surface features and Pluto for the orbit.
Gas Planet 2 was NovaSilisko's plan (along with the Easter egg storyline) which was put on an indefinite hold when he left Squad, unfortunately.

Gas Planet 2 was NovaSilisko's plan (along with the Easter egg storyline) which was put on an indefinite hold when he left Squad, unfortunately.

Yes this is true but they will add another gas planet after 'scope complete'. Of this I am certain.

This may be a bit off topic... but what were the circumstances and reasons surrounding Nova's departure from squad?

Did they have "creative disagreements" - in which case they may generally not have liked his ideas the further he went with them, and we're unlikely to see followups to his ideas.
I'd say new planets are well out of scope for 1.0. Getting the biomes done is the next big step and a new gas giant with a system of moons is only going to slow that process down considerably.
Um, isn't Eeloo based off of Europa. So it's not a coincidence.
Why did Novasilisko leave SQUAD? What's the easteregg storyline? (Will these questions be answered?? Tune in next time!)
